non prime is HvH hell. Prime is HvH hell unless you suffer through it for many hours and get shitloads of commends any way you can. Certain amounts of commends can "reset" your trust factor to "good-ish" so you won't be playing with full rage cheaters every game. Your hours in game, steam account, inventory, player behavior literally don't matter. Only commends seem to increase your trust factor as a new player. Either source some commends or have fun with HvH hell.
